Name: File System - Backup Directory
Description: Uses Robocopy to backup directories and files from a source to a destination.
Author: Dalmirog

Parameters.Name: BackupSource
Parameters.Label: Source
Parameters.HelpText: The source directory where files and folders will be copied from

Parameters.Name: BackupDestination
Parameters.Label: Destination folder
Parameters.HelpText: The Destination where the files will be copied to.

Parameters.Name: Options
Parameters.Label: Robocopy options
Parameters.HelpText: Robocopy accepts a few command line options (e.g. /S /E /Z). List of these can be [found here](http://ss64.com/nt/robocopy.html)

Parameters.Name: CreateStampedBackupFolder
Parameters.Label: Create stamped backup folder
Parameters.HelpText: If set to _True_ then it will create a dated backup folder under the destination folder (e.g. c:\backup\2014-05-11)
